Multiple get ready suites! Ideal for those with large wedding parties, big families, and weddings between 150-200 people. ## The PLATINUM Package - $9800 (*discounted rate offered through 5/25)
â€¢ Bridal suite located on the second floor with a beautiful covered porch overlooking the chapel and vineyard. The air conditioned suite is equipped with a full sized bathroom, full length mirror, and a well lit marble make-up and hair station with multiple outlets.
